section.heading: Granting TANF benefits to drug felons.
section.text: An adult who is a drug felon shall not be denied TANF benefits solely because he or she is a drug felon.

annotations.annotation: as added Apr. 20, 1999, D.C. Law 12-241, § 4(g), 46 DCR 905
For temporary (225 day) addition of section, see § 4(h) of Self-Sufficiency Promotion Temporary Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Law 12-230, April 20, 1999, law notification 46 DCR 4143).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2 of Access to Public Benefits Emergency Amendment Act of 2018 (D.C. Act 22-493, Oct. 23, 2018, 0 DCR 0).
